# informativeText

**Instance Property**

The alert’s informative text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var informativeText: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property must not be `nil`.

## Accessing Alert Text

- **messageText**: The alert’s message text or title.
